channel.title: Damned MSN Virus'
channel.description:
Yeah, I have one. I'm not stupid enough to accept those damned things, so it couldn't have been me. Perhaps my brother accepted something. I can't be sure. Infact I don't even know if the virus was given to me and I was unaware.
What the virus does? It just makes me send the file that gives others the virus automatically everytime I sign on. Is there any way I can get rid of it? I just don't want others accepting it, because some of them don't actually know it's a virus.

item.title: Damned MSN Virus'
item.dc:creator: @sidishere sidishere
item.description:
@sidishere wrote:

avg nod32 or kaspersky.

Read full topic

item.title: Damned MSN Virus'
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

Try AVG Free Antivirus and NOD32. One of those should help you get rid of it.

Read full topic
